text:
班级______ 姓名_______ 成绩______ 阅卷人_______
一、请选择对划线词语最恰当的解释。（ 每题2分，共10分）
1. 今天的天空格外晴朗，我们去公园玩吧。（ ）
A. 外边
B. 非常
C. 好奇
D. 有点儿
二、选择合适的词语填空。（ 每题2分，共10分）
鼓励
1. 老师应该一直___________自己的学生。
三、判断正误（正确的划∨；错误的划×）。（ 每题1分，共10分）
trans:
Class ______ Name ______ Grade ______ Examiner _______
I. Choose the most appropriate definition for the underlined word. (2 points each, 10 points in total)
1. The sky is especially clear today. Let's go to the park. ( )
A. Outdoors
B. Very
C. Curious
D. Slightly
II. Fill in the blanks with the correct word. (2 points each, 10 points in total)
Encourage
Teachers should always ________ their students.
III. True or False (Check ✓ for correct, ✘ for incorrect). (1 point each, 10 points in total)
